titleStmt.title: A newe reuenge for an olde grudge. Lately sette forth by I.S. VVho buildeth not vpon sure grounde, hath often beene, and now is founde a losse of time, a vaine expence, thus saith Goddes worde. An ouerthrowe of his presence. Thankes to the Lorde
titleStmt.author: Sutton, J., fl. 1567-1573.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Wylkes, for Francis Coldocke[,

notesStmt.note: Anti-Catholic pamphlet; supports Bishop Jewel and opposes Thomas Harding in Church of England controversy.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
